scripts.clean: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "npm run clean:tmp" "npm run clean:dev" "npm run clean:prod"
scripts.install_dependencies: npm install && node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "npm run bower" "npm run update_webdriver"
scripts.test: npm run unit_tests && npm run e2e_tests
scripts.uglify:js: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "node scripts/uglify.js js tmp/js/**/*.js !tmp/js/lib/**/* !tmp/js/**/*.spec.js tmp/js/ngTemplates.js tmp/js/min/app.min.js" "node scripts/uglify.js js tmp/js/lib/**/*.js tmp/js/min/lib.min.js"
scripts.checksum:js: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "node scripts/checksum.js tmp/js/min/app.min.js" "node scripts/checksum.js tmp/js/min/lib.min.js"
scripts.inject:js:prod: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp/js/min lib.*.min.js && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp/js/min app.*.min.js
scripts.inject:js:dev: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp js/lib/**/*.js && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp js/**/*.js !js/lib/**/*
scripts.uglify:css: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "node scripts/uglify.js css tmp/css/*.css !tmp/css/lib/**/* tmp/css/min/app.min.css" "node scripts/uglify.js css tmp/css/lib/**/*.css tmp/css/min/lib.min.css"
scripts.checksum:css: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "node scripts/checksum.js tmp/css/min/app.min.css" "node scripts/checksum.js tmp/css/min/lib.min.css"
scripts.inject:css:prod: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp/css/min lib.*.min.css && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp/css/min app.*.min.css
scripts.inject:css:dev: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp css/lib/**/*.css && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp css/**/*.css !css/lib/**/*
scripts.prep:html:prod: npm run cp -- app/**/*.jade tmp/jade && npm run compile:jade && npm run mv -- tmp/jade/**/*.html tmp/html -o && npm run ng_templates
scripts.prep:js:prod: npm run lint:js && npm run test && npm run cp app/**/*.js tmp/js -e app/**/*.spec.js && npm run uglify:js && npm run checksum:js && npm run inject:js:prod
scripts.prep:css:prod: npm run cp -- app/**/*.scss tmp/sass && npm run compile:sass && npm run autoprefix && npm run uglify:css && npm run checksum:css && npm run inject:css:prod
scripts.copy:prod: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "npm run cp -- tmp/html/index.html dist/index.html" "npm run cp -- tmp/js/min/*.min.js dist" "npm run cp -- tmp/css/min/*.min.css dist" "npm run cp -- app/assets/images/* dist/assets/images"
scripts.copy:dev: node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "npm run cp -- tmp/html/index.html dev/index.html" "npm run cp -- tmp/html/**/*.html dev/html -e tmp/html/index.html -e tmp/html/index-no-dependencies.html" "npm run cp -- tmp/css/**/*.css dev/css" "npm run cp -- tmp/js/**/*.js dev/js" "npm run cp -- app/assets/images/**/* dev/assets/images"
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm run prep:html:prod && npm run prep:js:prod && npm run prep:css:prod && npm run copy:prod && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run cp -- app/**/*.jade tmp/jade && npm run compile:jade && npm run mv -- tmp/jade/**/*.html tmp/html && node scripts/inject-live-reload-script.js tmp/html/index.html 9090 && npm run cp -- tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index-no-dependencies.html && npm run cp -- app/**/*.scss tmp/sass && npm run compile:sass && npm run autoprefix && npm run cp -- app/**/*.js tmp/js -e app/**/*.spec.js && npm run inject:js:dev && npm run inject:css:dev && npm run copy:dev
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && node node_modules/parallelshell/index.js "npm run serve" "npm run watch" "npm run livereload"
